import { Carousel } from "react-bootstrap"; import { useContext } from "react"; import { ModeContext } from "./ModeContext"; function SlideShow() { const [show, setShow,language, setLanguage]= useContext(ModeContext); return (

{language.slide[1]}

{language.slide[2]}

{language.slide[3]}

{language.slide[4]}

{language.slide[5]}

{language.slide[6]}

{language.slide[7]}

{language.slide[8]}
); } export default SlideShow;
